department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: All the documents required must be submitted by 2 pm on November 8, 2022. After 2 pm, the bid will be declared non-responsive. The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency, invites you to submit proposals for the acquisition of exterior wall repairs for a building in Quebec, Canada. The repair work is specified in Annex A.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
**Title:** PR4725_9F030-220051_Exterior Wall Repairs Block 2

### Announcement Details
##### Reference Number
WS3696096833-Doc3704402135

##### Amendment Number
2

##### Solicitation Number
WS3696096833

##### Publication Date
October 14, 2022

##### Tender Closing Date
November 8, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

### Tender Overview
The Government of Canada, represented by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), is inviting bidders to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) to acquire exterior wall repair services for Block 2 in St-Hubert, Québec, Canada. The tender calls for repair services that meet the requirements outlined in Annex A.

### Tender Details
- **Procurement Category:** CNST
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Opportunity:** None
- **Regions of Delivery:** Montreal
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
- **Expected Contract End Date:** None

### Contact Information
- **Contractor Contact:** Antoine Englead (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email:** [englead.antoine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:englead.antoine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Phone:** Not provided
- **Fax:** Not provided

### Tender Documents
The tender will be advertised on the Ariba website. Bidders can access the tender documents and submit their responses at the designated URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14369683?extsite=MTQzNjk2ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14369683?extsite=MTQzNjk2ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Important Links
